name: XSCalendar
0:
”Alexa, open school calendar”
”Alexa, ask school calendar what day it is today”
”Alexa, ask school calendar what day it is tomorrow”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: school calendar
des: This Skill helps you track Xavier's 7 day academic cycle easily. Ask Alexa what day it is tomorrow or setup Routines to give you a daily reminder.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
